abstract: The cable network covered the death of Whitney Houston wall to wall in prime time, and had one of its strongest recent nights in the ratings with a peak at 9 p.m. of 3.15 million viewers.
snippet: The cable network covered the death of Whitney Houston wall to wall in prime time, and had one of its strongest recent nights in the ratings with a peak at 9 p.m. of 3.15 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: CNN stepped up on Saturday night to cover the death of Whitney Houston wall to wall in prime time — and it paid off with one of the strongest recent nights in the ratings for the cable channel.

headline.main: CNN’s Whitney Houston Coverage Rewarded in Ratings
